scripts.build:functions: rm -rf dist/functions && BUILD_TARGET=functions node --loader ts-node/esm src/scripts/build.ts
scripts.build:features: rm -rf dist/features && BUILD_TARGET=features node --loader ts-node/esm src/scripts/build.ts
scripts.build:tools-functions: rm -rf dist/tools/functions && BUILD_TARGET=tools/functions node --loader ts-node/esm src/scripts/build.ts
scripts.build:scripts: rm -rf dist/scripts && BUILD_TARGET=scripts node --loader ts-node/esm src/scripts/build.ts
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npm run build:functions && npm run build:features && npm run build:tools-functions && npm run build:scripts
scripts.lint: npm run lint:prettier && npm run lint:eslint
scripts.do:batch1: npm run check-type && npm run build:features && node dist/features/batch1/index.mjs
